page.title: 07Whitehills Banffshire News
page.content:
The {Banffshire Journal} is the most truly local paper. Published weekly in Banff it covers the area Gardenstown/Turriff/Buckie and is devoted to local news and advertising.
During the past month the {'Banffie'} has included as front page stories: Development of a{Picnic Site} at Whitehills, Purchase of the fishing vessel {'Eastern Dawn'} to work with the {'Bon Ami'} as a pair trawler.Modernisation of the {Village {Hall. }Appointment of a manageress (B.Sc. Agri.) to run{Ladysbridge Farm} and the 'miraculous' recovery of a Whitehills baby from nerve disease. { } {Inside-paper coverage}includes details of{a forth-coming gala, road {resurfacing}and a{parents petition}to maintain staffing at Whitehills school
